mean_en: Things that interconnect or are interconnected are connected to or with each other. You can also say that one thing interconnects with another.
word_etyma: inter 在…之间+ con 共同 + nect 连结+ ing表示状态→interconnecting互相连接的
sentence: It was interesting to see the interconnecting links between my friends.
sentence_trans: 我很感兴趣想看看我朋友们互相之间有何联系。
